sentences.en: A guest to stop at Iping in the wintertime was an unheard - of piece of luck.
sentences.cn: 冬天居然会有客人上伊滨来住,这真是闻所未闻的好运气.

sentences.en: As a result, sea ice extent for the Arctic actually peaked on March 31, 2010—the latest peak of wintertime Arctic sea ice extent in the satellite record.
sentences.cn: 结果导致2010年北极的海冰范围是在3月31日达到峰值——这是有卫星记录以来北极海冰范围最晚的冬季峰值。

sentences.en: Because her home was small , was always warm and toasty at her house in the wintertime.
sentences.cn: 她的公寓很小﹐所以冬天屋里总是很暖和.

sentences.en: Come on, boys, get stuck in - you need a good meal in wintertime.
sentences.cn: 来吧, 孩子们, 专心吃饭 - 冬天要把饭吃好.

sentences.en: Don't your feet get cold in the wintertime?
sentences.cn: 难道冬天时,你的双脚不冷 吗 ?

sentences.en: For instance, an ear of corn will cost about 10 cents in the summer and nearly a dollar in the wintertime.
sentences.cn: 举例来说，一个玉米棒在夏季的时候售10美分左右，而在冬季的时候差不多售1美元。

sentences.en: Have a picnic. In wintertime, it's just as fun to have a picnic indoors.
sentences.cn: 去野餐. 在冬天, 在室内野餐也同样有趣.

sentences.en: He had a full beard that, by wintertime, could be pretty thick.
sentences.cn: 在冬天的时候, 他的一脸大胡子很浓密.

sentences.en: Heating bills are highest in the wintertime.
In wintertime he will don a wet suit and go right on surfing.
sentences.cn: 到冬季,他就穿上橡皮紧身衣去冲浪.

sentences.en: In wintertime he will don a wet suit andright on surfing.
sentences.cn: 因为他只有一套衣服,所以他不愿冒被淋湿的危险.

sentences.en: In wintertime, he still go surfing.
My feet get cold in the wintertime.
sentences.cn: 在冬天,我的脚会觉得很冷.

sentences.en: Some people swear they gain more weight in the wintertime.
sentences.cn: 一些人声称他们在冬天容易长肉.

sentences.en: This photo of the towers was taken during wintertime.
sentences.cn: 这些钙华塔的照片是在冬季拍摄的。

sentences.en: What is treatment of wintertime diseases in summer?

words.tran_cn: 作过冬准备；在…装御寒设备
为…作过冬准备；使适应冬季使用；使防冻

trans.tran_en: the time when it is winter
